subject: RE: [junit] Testing Applets
msgSnippet: Why do you think that an applet would be tested any differently than any other application? ... Robert S. Koss, Ph.D.   | Training and Mentoring Senior
messageBody:
Why do you think that an applet would be tested any differently than any other application?
 

----
Robert S. Koss, Ph.D.   | Training and Mentoring
Senior Consultant       | Object Oriented Design
Object Mentor, Inc.     | C++, Java
www.objectmentor.com    | Extreme Programming

From: Jamie Nettles [mailto:jamien@...]

To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Testing Applets

I want to test an applet or pieces of an applet using jUnit.  Any suggestions?
 
Jamie Nettles
